findings.message: Token (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#184-214) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:TokenBase.transfer(address,uint256) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#53-55)
findings.name: erc20-interface

findings.message:
TokenBase._transfer(address,address,uint256) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#42-51) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#50)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
Owned.transferOwnership(address) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#15-17) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#16)
findings.name: events-access

findings.message:
Owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#16)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
Option._checkOptionExercise(uint256,uint256) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#144-147) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- exercised <= option * canExercisedTimes / optionTotalTimes (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#146)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
WorkProff.proofOfWork(uint256) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#95-118) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(n >= bytes8(minerDifficulty)) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#98)
	- require(bool)(timeSinceLastProof >= 5) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#101)
	- now - foundingTime < minerPreTime (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#105)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Option.min(uint256,uint256) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#140-142) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- a < b (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#141)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected n = bytes8(sha3()(nonce,minerCurrentChallenge)) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#97):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected minerCurrentChallenge = sha3()(nonce,minerCurrentChallenge,block.blockhash(block.number - 1)) (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#117):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.17 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.17 (0x0a7d11ea2308f80eb239f2e4c77715725ae8650d.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version
